summary: Homepage UI was updated to render a couple photo image in the main question card and reference it via a public `/assets/generated/...` path. However, the required static image asset itself does not appear to have been added under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` per the diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the couple photo as a static asset under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` and reference it directly from the homepage UI (do not serve images from the backend).
missing_requirements.reason: The homepage references `/assets/generated/couple-photo.dim_1200x1200.jpg`, but the diff summary shows no added files, so the required image file is not evidenced as present at `frontend/public/assets/generated/couple-photo.dim_1200x1200.jpg`.
